topic.title: Zeronet DNS built by 19@zid (completely for free forever and your information do not get out of zeronet)
topic.body:
You can use it by starting zeronet with "zeronet.py --bit_resolver 14vveXKfYf4ywjnkLedqWJzqSSF5YrntYM"
http://127.0.0.1:43110/14vveXKfYf4ywjnkLedqWJzqSSF5YrntYM/

topic.title: Zeronet Sandbox
topic.body:
http://localhost:43110/12M8Qmixyhopbhaeue79BRcpoMKSH3SKhf/</br>
The private key of this site is publish.</br>
Feel free to do anything (like testing your page or just play for fun).</br>
The private key: "5K3Mjse7fYYHpxsQezFuAUR87jvdMGYPM6rHRpTgan4AgY1eiyE" (without quotes).</br>

1_1CZhapKybCk4VkGiSso1YzXZd1oG5C3oAw.body: Yes, it is. You can start building your zite now.

2_1HUrhTUZFB2KKsXLUv1vugPH358iB6zsiY.body: This zite is currently under development.

> [ks](#comment_16_14TDWFVHuTXNcg8pp6LRr7v9ZcfbFsMSyx): I'm not sure I understand this. Is it a replacement for ZeroName or a real DNS resolver for all .bit domains?
#It's __*NOT*__ a replacement for ZeroName.
It's just an alternative. But I will sync it's database with ZeroName's once a week (or day, maybe), so that it can resolve both .bit domains (copied from ZeroName database) and other domains registered by yourself (with a non-.bit suffix).

> [weakish](#comment_2_1GnJD7CXskmG8GywMbTvbP12wneCFW9XzR): How to map my domain to ZeroNet site?A TXT record?

send me a zeromail and i will add it manually.

> [tkarita](#comment_2_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): Most of the site is available, but somehow index.html and data/names.json aren't.  Could there have been a problem while publishing them?

Sorry, I forgot to sign & publish content.json. Does it work now?

2_1FJf2hQWT6YY9oxXozkx1ZvBHyAJVYmb76.body:
> [suzouhiodjzmldh](#comment_10_12iiajZz3dGdYuEyqTR5hvGECWmGh748HL): i just see "embark" what is there?

It happened to me, too.

> [suzouhiodjzmldh](#comment_10_12iiajZz3dGdYuEyqTR5hvGECWmGh748HL): i just see "embark" what is there? ```

SLEEPNOWINTHEFIRE

love, from the stars above.
embark
Hey people. Sleepnowinthefire here. I wanted to share some thoughts with you.

06.08.2016

immunity


Every single one of you on Zeronet is making history right now.
The days of an ICANN DNS controlled internet are coming to an end.
Tell everyone you know about Zeronet. Lets make the swarm as big as possible.
You have the following responsibilities:

1. A proper forum for Zeronet.
A reddit or Voat clone perhaps.
TelescopeNova would probably be the best.

2. In-browser P2P video working on Zeronet.
``` That's what he wanted to put on this page. But apparently, it was covered by something else.
